  15. ‌type !'a t

  17. external make : 'a -> 'a t = "%makemutable"
  18. external get : 'a t -> 'a = "%atomic_load"
  19. external exchange : 'a t -> 'a -> 'a = "%atomic_exchange"
  20. external compare_and_set : 'a t -> 'a -> 'a -> bool = "%atomic_cas"
  21. external fetch_and_add : int t -> int -> int = "%atomic_fetch_add"
  22. external ignore : 'a -> unit = "%ignore"

  24. ‌let set r x = ignore (exchange r x)
  25. ‌let incr r = ignore (fetch_and_add r 1)
  26. ‌let decr r = ignore (fetch_and_add r (-1))
